Uses of Interface
com.stormpath.sdk.authc.UsernamePasswordRequestBuilder

  • Packages that use UsernamePasswordRequestBuilder 
    Package Description
    com.stormpath.sdk.authc  

    • Uses of UsernamePasswordRequestBuilder in com.stormpath.sdk.authc

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.authc that return UsernamePasswordRequestBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static UsernamePasswordRequestBuilder UsernamePasswordRequest.builder()
      Returns a new UsernamePasswordRequestBuilder instance, used to construct UsernamePasswordRequests.
      UsernamePasswordRequestBuilder UsernamePasswordRequestBuilder.inAccountStore(AccountStore accountStore)
      Sets a specific AccountStore that should process this authentication request, or null if the application's default account store authentication flow should execute.
      UsernamePasswordRequestBuilder UsernamePasswordRequestBuilder.setHost(String host)
      Specifies the host from where the end-user is accessing your application.
      UsernamePasswordRequestBuilder UsernamePasswordRequestBuilder.setPassword(char[] password)
      Specifies the password of the account that will be authenticated.
      UsernamePasswordRequestBuilder UsernamePasswordRequestBuilder.setPassword(String password)
      Specifies the password of the account that will be authenticated.
      UsernamePasswordRequestBuilder UsernamePasswordRequestBuilder.setUsernameOrEmail(String usernameOrEmail)
      Specifies the username or email that will be used to authenticate an account.
      UsernamePasswordRequestBuilder UsernamePasswordRequestBuilder.withResponseOptions(BasicAuthenticationOptions options)
      Ensures that when the response is obtained, it will be retrieved with the specified options.
